detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the lines
line
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the line
line
pointer to a line object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a line objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new line
pointer to the created line

Set an array of points. The line object will connect these points.
line
pointer to a line object
point_a
an array of points. Only the address is saved, so the array can NOT be a local variable which will be destroyed
point_num
number of points in 'point_a'

Enable (or disable) the auto-size option. The size of the object will fit to its points. (set width to x max and height to y max)
line
pointer to a line object
en
true: auto size is enabled, false: auto size is disabled

Enable (or disable) the y coordinate inversion. If enabled then y will be subtracted from the height of the object, therefore the y=0 coordinate will be on the bottom.
line
pointer to a line object
en
true: enable the y inversion, false:disable the y inversion

Get the auto size attribute
line
pointer to a line object
true: auto size is enabled, false: disabled

Get the y inversion attribute
line
pointer to a line object
true: y inversion is enabled, false: disabled
